title: Mathematics: an active learning approach
creator_credit: Dennis Claringbold and Melbourne College of Advanced Education. Media Production Centre
brief_description: Shows teacher Ross McKeown working with Year 6 students on various mathematical concepts. Depicts ways to organize the classroom and outlines some activities.
